st:Description.name: GBiWGeneral
st:Description.st:role: These setting parameters define BIW fastening application parameters
st:Description.st:detailedRole: Enable the user to specify the BIW fasetners parameters

st:attribute.Name: BfmDefaultSetUpPath
st:attribute.st:role: Specifies the directory that contains the fastener standard to use

st:attribute.Name: ImportSetUp
st:attribute.st:role: : Indicates if standard file is imported automatically

st:attribute.Name: CheckConsistencyStd
st:attribute.st:role: : Check standard file consistency at import time

st:attribute.Name: BfmExportDir
st:attribute.st:role: Selects the directory that will contain the export file
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Enables the user to select the output directory that will contain the export file

st:attribute.Name: BfmReportDir
st:attribute.st:role: Selects the directory that will contain the generated report
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Enables the user to select the output directory that will contain the generated report

st:attribute.Name: FixedSpotSizeCheck
st:attribute.st:role: : Indicates if fixed spot size is used during drafting extraction

st:attribute.Name: AngularTolerance
st:attribute.st:role: : Specify angular tolerance for drafting extraction

st:attribute.Name: ReverseDirection
st:attribute.st:role: : Indicates if drafing view reverse direction is included

st:attribute.Name: EnoviaData
st:attribute.st:role: : Indicates if Enovia VPM unsaved data creation is allowed

st:attribute.Name: LockIDCheck
st:attribute.st:role: : Indicates if fastener identifier is locked

st:attribute.Name: AutomateNamingCheck
st:attribute.st:role: : To select automatic numbering of BiW Joint and Joint Body

st:attribute.Name: NamingConventionCheck
st:attribute.st:role: To indicate naming convention Full or Partial

st:enum.st:role: Full name of joined component is used in numbering
Partial name from start of joined component is used in numbering
Partial name from end of joined component is used in numbering

st:attribute.Name: NumberOfCharsInComponentName
st:attribute.st:role: : Number of characters from component name used in numbering
